attributes.action: Make it illegal to consume alcahol by anybody under the age of 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its all well enough for people to blab on about shops selling alcahol to under aged teens, someone who wants to purchas alcahol will always find a way round it.

The problem of under aged drinking should be tackled from a different angle. Make it illegal for any person under the age of 18 to consume alcahol. If this is done then the Police could arrest these people and have them dealt with through the courts, instead of just pouring the alcahol away and moving them on.

Anybody under the age of 18 suspected of being drunk and disorderly should be able to to breathalised, and if found to have consumed alcahol be dealt with through the courts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
